name: Writing for Ruby
description:
Writing for Ruby is a game made for the Weekly Game Jam week 237.

Click on the words that appear to select them to write out your love letter. You will find nouns, verbs, and adjectives that are either flattering or unflattering. Pay attention to the Part of Speech definer at the bottom, as that will tell you if you should be clicking on nouns, verbs or adjectives. 

Try to get a date with Ruby!

Programming is done by Monev94

Art is done by my good friend Jasmine Fisher, or Snazi_Jazi_Artnfun on instagram
